comment: Hardworking, sincere, wise and practical banda, always helpful, bohot calm and comfortable aura deta hai. Your positive outlook towards life is somthing that inspires me. Glad to have known you. I know wherever you go you will standout as the best. Best wishes for your future.
name: Kh. Humendro Singh

comment: This is the most dedicated guy I have ever seen. With no fomo in anything. Studying with you was my pleasure. Kaash fy, sy bhi campus mein saath mein rehte toh cgpa aur better hota apna😬. Bss harsh se ladai thodi kam kara kar. Hope you become a gusted officer soon.🤝
name: Akshat Nahata

comment: 4 se 10 tk safar dekha haii bhai ne. sarkari admi banke bhool mt jana. or mere sare kaam krwa dena😅 hardworking and dedicated banda haiii. thoda km tension liya kr. khush rehh or hasta rehh.
name: Harsh Jain

comment: Teri tere kaam ke taraf jo dedication h and the way you approach the problem is one of you biggest trait. Bhai wh casual engliz talks hamesha yaad rhenge. Jabalpur mein rehna toh milte rehna. Baaki jain sahab se behas krne mein mza aata tha tere saath😂😂. Take care bhai and be happy and safe from dengue
name: PARTH DWIVEDI

comment: One of the most sincere and hardworking ppl I met on campus. You're funny at times but serious about things too. I won't forget ur eyes yaar. Keep growing and all the best 🥹🥹✌️✌️
name: K Madhumitha

comment:
If there is a list of guys having the opposite nature of his name, this guy tops it🙂🙂. Definitely the silent but deadly guy. The most industrious person of our group👏👏.
Always ready to help his friends🙏🏻🙏🏻. Had a great time with you discussing those assignments🙏🏻🙏🏻.
name: Ayush
